item.description:
Sunday, June 20, 2010 at 6pm - FREE (BRING A SPANISH APPETIZER TO SHARE)
La Excelencia


DURATION 90 minutes
LOCATION Elm Street Stage, New Haven Green
A 12-piece salsa orchestra formed in New York City in 2005, La Excelencia’s music is both socially conscious and contagiously danceable. Their style of salsa, known as “salsa dura,” is characterized by the driving rhythms of the bongos, congas and timbales; the blaring brass of the trombones and trumpets; and the call and response of the vocalists.

group.name: New Haven Wine and Dining Meetup Group,

item.name: Let Us Break Bread Drink Spanish Wine and Enjoy a Latin Salsa Band Concert
